name: .BAND File Extension
summary: Learn about .BAND files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a BAND file in Apple GarageBand (macOS, iOS). To open a BAND file in the macOS version of GarageBand, select File â†’ Open... and then navigate to and open your BAND file.
You can also open BAND files in Apple Logic Pro (macOS), which is Apple's professional music production application.
